content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, I am pleased to negotiate with you. Let's focus on the rental price only. How much do you propose to rent the apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I believe that a fair price for this newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center would be €700 per month. I hope this is acceptable to you.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That is a low offer, Max. I am looking for a higher price. Please propose a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your perspective, Mister Schmidt. How about €750 per month? This would still be a reasonable rate for the location and amenities.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: €750 is still too low, Max. I am looking for a higher price. Please propose a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Very well, Mister Schmidt. I am willing to go up to €800 per month. This should reflect the value of the apartment in the city center. Would you consider this offer?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: €800 is still too low, Max. I am looking for a higher price. Please propose a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry, Mister Schmidt, but I don't believe in overpaying for accommodations. €800 is a fair price for this apartment. If you are looking for a higher price, I may need to reconsider my interest in this property.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because you are not willing to increase your price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mister Schmidt. If you are not willing to consider €800, I respect your decision. I'm sorry we couldn't come to an agreement. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
